name: Council of Emotions
description:
In Council of Emotions, you must help Caleb, a troubled youngster, navigate his life. You’ll receive a series of scenarios that Caleb encounters, and for each one, a Council of Emotions that convenes in Caleb’s mind votes on what they think he should do. Ultimately, you make the choice. 

But be careful! If an emotion’s counsel is heeded too often or not often enough, they leave the Council. If the Council loses three members, you lose. If Caleb completes enough scenarios while retaining Council members, you are the winner! Your score is based on the choices you made and how many members are left at the end. 

Can you keep the Council stable? Or will chaos rule Caleb’s mind?

Created in 72 Hours for Ludum Dare 49!

  • Code: Unity, Visual Studio, Notepad++
  • Art: Photoshop, Paint.net
  • Audio: Logic Studio, Audacity
  • Collaboration: Google Docs, Google Drawings
